short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for marketers that expands the possibilities of working with Facebook Ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension shows the number of ad impressions, allows you to download/save ad creatives from Facebook Ad Library and open ads in a new tab. The extension can hide regular posts from the Facebook feed and leave only ads there, autoscrolling of the feed has been added. All ads from the feed are saved in the local storage in a convenient form.

— Save ads from Facebook Ad Library with one click.
— Saves ads from Facebook feed.
— Download ad creative in HD quality from Facebook feed and Ad Library.
— The extension shows the number of ad impressions and spent for EU ads only.

v3.05
— Fixed errors

v3.03
— Fixed error of processing fonts other than English fonts

v3.02
— Fixed the error of the “Open in new tab” button

v3.01
— Fixed bugs

v3.0
— Updated the interface design. Now the extension is called Ad Library Cloud.

v2.3
— Facebook made changes to the ad library page, we've taken them into account in this version.

v2.2
— Added the ability to download ad creatives in HD quality.
— Now you can save ads from Ad Library to local storage.

v2.1
CTA buttons in saved ads are now displayed correctly. Optimized work of the extension.

v2.0
We have started developing a brand new functionality for convenient work with Facebook Ads. Now the extension can hide regular posts from Facebook feed and leave only ads there, autoscroll feed has been added. All ads from the feed are saved to local storage in a convenient form.

v1.7
At this time, Facebook has blocked the ability to receive additional information. We have found a solution and work is underway, but it will take time.

v1.6
Changes in the description according to Meta requirements.

v1.5
Facebook has changed the data rendition, removed the GEO on which the ad is shown.

v1.4
The functionality of the extension has been restored

v1.2
Updated the description of errors in the extension.

v1.1
Added a "reach" indicator. Improved the work of the extension.

v1
The extension is adapted to the new Facebook Ads Library interface.

v0.9
Changed product explanations in one place.

v0.8
Fixed a bug caused by changes to the Ad Library page.

v0.7
The extension now downloads video creations at once in .mp4 format.

v0.6
Added support for public advertising.
